Name: JellyfishElectric
Notes: A jellyfish enemy that spawns a Coin (SMG1) or ten Star Bits (SMG2) when defeated. It can be defeated with a Koopa Shell or the Rainbow power-up and it damages the player upon contact. It can move on a path or remain stationary. The Orange Luma can freeze it.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: Sets the rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 5.

Obj_arg1.Name: Last Point Wait Time
Obj_arg1.Description: How long it remains on the last path point before it moves again. Default is 60.

Obj_arg2.Name: Movement Type
Obj_arg2.Description: Specifies how it should move on the path when it reaches the last point.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
